verses.verse: And the famine <S%H7458><s%> was sore <S%H3515><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H834><s%> they had eaten <S%H398><s%> up the corn <S%H7668><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had brought <S%H935><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, Go <S%H7725><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> buy <S%H7666><s%> us a little <S%H4592><s%> food. <S%H400><s%>

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to him, saying, <S%H559><s%> The man <S%H376><s%> did solemnly <S%H5749><s%> protest <S%H5749><s%> to us, saying, <S%H559><s%> You shall not see <S%H7200><s%> my face, <S%H6440><s%> except <S%H1115><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> be with you.
If <S%H518><s%> you will send <S%H7971><s%> our brother <S%H251><s%> with us, we will go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> and buy <S%H7666><s%> you food: <S%H400><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> you will not send <S%H7971><s%> him, we will not go <S%H3381><s%> down: <S%H3381><s%> for the man <S%H376><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to us, You shall not see <S%H7200><s%> my face, <S%H6440><s%> except <S%H1115><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> be with you.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> dealt you so ill <S%H7489><s%> with me, as to tell <S%H5046><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> whether <S%H5750><s%> you had yet <S%H5750><s%> a brother? <S%H251><s%>

And they said, <S%H559><s%> The man <S%H376><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> us straightly of our state, and of our kindred, <S%H4138><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Is your father <S%H1><s%> yet alive? <S%H2416><s%> have <S%H3426><s%> you another brother? <S%H251><s%> and we told <S%H5046><s%> him according <S%H5921><s%> to the tenor <S%H6310><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> words: <S%H1697><s%> could we certainly know <S%H3045><s%> that he would say, <S%H559><s%> Bring <S%H3381><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> down? <S%H3381><s%>

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> Send <S%H7971><s%> the lad <S%H5288><s%> with me, and we will arise <S%H6965><s%> and go; <S%H3212><s%> that we may live, <S%H2421><s%> and not die, <S%H4191><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> we, and you, and also <S%H1571><s%> our little <S%H2945><s%> ones.

I will be surety <S%H6148><s%> for him; of my hand <S%H3027><s%> shall you require <S%H1245><s%> him: if <S%H518><s%> I bring <S%H935><s%> him not to you, and set <S%H3322><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> you, then let me bear <S%H2398><s%> the blame <S%H2398><s%> for ever: <S%H3605><s%>
For except <S%H3884><s%> we had lingered, <S%H4102><s%> surely <S%H3588><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> we had returned <S%H7725><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> second time. <S%H6471><s%>

And their father <S%H1><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, If <S%H518><s%> it must be so <S%H3651><s%> now, <S%H645><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> this; <S%H2063><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> of the best <S%H2173><s%> fruits <S%H2173><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> in your vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and carry <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> a present, <S%H4503><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> balm, <S%H6875><s%> and a little <S%H4592><s%> honey, <S%H1706><s%> spices, <S%H5219><s%> and myrrh, <S%H3910><s%> nuts, <S%H992><s%> and almonds: <S%H8247><s%>

And take <S%H3947><s%> double <S%H4932><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> in your hand; <S%H3027><s%> and the money <S%H3701><s%> that was brought <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of your sacks, <S%H572><s%> carry <S%H7725><s%> it again <S%H7725><s%> in your hand; <S%H3027><s%> peradventure <S%H194><s%> it was an oversight: <S%H4870><s%>
Take <S%H3947><s%> also your brother, <S%H251><s%> and arise, <S%H6965><s%> go <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to the man: <S%H376><s%>

And God <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> you mercy <S%H7356><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the man, <S%H376><s%> that he may send <S%H7971><s%> away your other <S%H312><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> and Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%> If <S%H834><s%> I be bereaved <S%H7921><s%> of my children, I am bereaved. <S%H7921><s%>

And the men <S%H582><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> that present, <S%H4503><s%> and they took <S%H3947><s%> double <S%H4932><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> in their hand <S%H3027><s%>and Benjamin; <S%H1144><s%> and rose <S%H6965><s%> up, and went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Joseph. <S%H3130><s%>

And when Joseph <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> with them, he said <S%H559><s%> to the ruler <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> of his house, <S%H1004><s%> Bring <S%H935><s%> these men <S%H582><s%> home, <S%H1004><s%> and slay, <S%H2874><s%> and make ready; <S%H3559><s%> for these men <S%H582><s%> shall dine <S%H398><s%> with me at noon. <S%H6672><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Joseph <S%H3130><s%> bade; <S%H559><s%> and the man <S%H376><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> into Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

And the men <S%H582><s%> were afraid, <S%H3372><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they were brought <S%H935><s%> into Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> house; <S%H1004><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> Because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> of the money <S%H3701><s%> that was returned <S%H7725><s%> in our sacks <S%H572><s%> at the first <S%H8462><s%> time <S%H8462><s%> are we brought <S%H935><s%> in; that he may seek <S%H1556><s%> occasion <S%H1556><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> us, and fall <S%H5307><s%> on us, and take <S%H3947><s%> us for slaves, <S%H5650><s%> and our asses. <S%H2543><s%>

And they came <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to the steward <S%H376><s%> of Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and they communed <S%H1696><s%> with him at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%>
And said, <S%H559><s%> O sir, <S%H113><s%> we came <S%H3381><s%> indeed down <S%H3381><s%> at the first <S%H8462><s%> time <S%H8462><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> food: <S%H400><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H3588><s%> we came <S%H935><s%> to the inn, <S%H4411><s%> that we opened <S%H6605><s%> our sacks, <S%H572><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> every man's <S%H376><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> was in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of his sack, <S%H572><s%> our money <S%H3701><s%> in full weight: <S%H4948><s%> and we have brought <S%H7725><s%> it again <S%H7725><s%> in our hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And other <S%H312><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> have we brought <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> in our hands <S%H3027><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> food: <S%H400><s%> we cannot <S%H3808><s%> tell <S%H3045><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> our money <S%H3701><s%> in our sacks. <S%H572><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Peace <S%H7965><s%> be to you, fear <S%H3372><s%> not: your God, <S%H430><s%> and the God <S%H430><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you treasure <S%H4301><s%> in your sacks: <S%H572><s%> I had <S%H935><s%> your money. <S%H3701><s%> And he brought <S%H3318><s%> Simeon <S%H8095><s%> out to them.

And the man <S%H376><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> into Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them water, <S%H4325><s%> and they washed <S%H7364><s%> their feet; <S%H7272><s%> and he gave <S%H5414><s%> their asses <S%H2543><s%> provender. <S%H4554><s%>

And they made ready <S%H3559><s%> the present <S%H4503><s%> against <S%H5704><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> came <S%H935><s%> at noon: <S%H6672><s%> for they heard <S%H8085><s%> that they should eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And when Joseph <S%H3130><s%> came <S%H935><s%> home, <S%H1004><s%> they brought <S%H935><s%> him the present <S%H4503><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was in their hand <S%H3027><s%> into the house, <S%H1004><s%> and bowed <S%H7812><s%> themselves to him to the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And he asked <S%H7592><s%> them of their welfare, <S%H7965><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Is your father <S%H1><s%> well, <S%H7965><s%> the old <S%H2205><s%> man of whom <S%H834><s%> you spoke? <S%H559><s%> Is he yet <S%H5750><s%> alive? <S%H2416><s%>

And they answered, <S%H559><s%> Your servant <S%H5650><s%> our father <S%H1><s%> is in good <S%H7965><s%> health, <S%H7965><s%> he is yet <S%H5750><s%> alive. <S%H2416><s%> And they bowed <S%H6915><s%> down <S%H6915><s%> their heads, and made obeisance. <S%H7812><s%>

And he lifted <S%H5375><s%> up his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> his mother's <S%H517><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Is this <S%H2088><s%> your younger <S%H6996><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> you spoke <S%H559><s%> to me? And he said, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to you, my son. <S%H1121><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> made haste; <S%H4116><s%> for his bowels <S%H7356><s%> did yearn <S%H3648><s%> on his brother: <S%H251><s%> and he sought <S%H1245><s%> where to weep; <S%H1058><s%> and he entered <S%H935><s%> into his chamber, <S%H2315><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>
And he washed <S%H7364><s%> his face, <S%H6440><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> out, and refrained <S%H662><s%> himself, and said, <S%H559><s%> Set <S%H7760><s%> on bread. <S%H3899><s%>

And they set <S%H7760><s%> on for him by himself, and for them by themselves, <S%H905><s%> and for the Egyptians, <S%H4713><s%> which did eat <S%H398><s%> with him, by themselves: <S%H905><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> might <S%H3201><s%> not eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> with the Hebrews; <S%H5680><s%> for that is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

And they sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> according to his birthright, <S%H1062><s%> and the youngest <S%H6810><s%> according to his youth: <S%H6812><s%> and the men <S%H582><s%> marveled <S%H8539><s%> one <S%H376><s%> at <S%H413><s%> another. <S%H7453><s%>

And he took <S%H5375><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> messes <S%H4864><s%> to them from before <S%H6440><s%> him: but Benjamin's <S%H1144><s%> mess <S%H4864><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> times <S%H3027><s%> so much <S%H7235><s%> as any <S%H3605><s%> of their's. And they drank, <S%H8354><s%> and were merry <S%H7937><s%> with him.
